metaTags.metaTitle: Stream solutions page - Video live streaming
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Stream simplifies live video streaming with simple APIs. Deliver ultra low latency streaming and interactive experiences for any device.

relatedBlades.title: Ultra low-latency live streaming
relatedBlades.copy:
Say goodbye to time-wasting video deployment steps. Run live broadcasts with Cloudflare Stream.

- __Unified end-to-end platform__: Upload, store, encode, and broadcast live video — without hiring a team of video experts.
- __No infrastructure to maintain__: Stream fully manages video storage, encoding, delivery, and analytics.
- __Reduce latency and buffering__: Cloudflare's [global network](https://www.cloudflare.com/network/) is your own fast lane on the Internet.
- __Cost-effective streaming__: Stop paying for video ingestion, encoding, or bandwidth.

relatedBlades.subtitle: Deliver live broadcasts with one API

features.title: Low-latency streaming at scale
features.description: Focus on creating live content, not configuring infrastructure. Stream automatically delivers low-latency video at the ideal resolution, across a variety of connections, devices, and platforms.

features.title: Developer-friendly video API
features.description: Upload, store, encode, and deliver video with one simplified platform. A unified API ensures smooth interactions between different parts of the video workflow.

features.title: Support for multiple protocols
features.description: Support for Low-Latency HTTP Live Streaming (LL-HLS) helps you get closer to viewers and build more interactive features. You can also stream with secure RTMP, or the newer SRT protocol.

features.title: Transparent pricing on one platform
features.description: Unlike traditional video CDNs, Stream is billed by minutes watched instead of total bytes transferred.  Never pay for ingress (broadcasting to us), compute (encoding), or egress.

relatedBlades.quote: "With Cloudflare Stream, our users see every live event with the lowest latency possible."

quoteCarousel.quote: "I think most people don't realize just how complicated video hosting and distribution is … So what Cloudflare Stream allowed us to do is just give us an out-of-the-box solution for just providing video streaming to our users."

relatedBlades.title: Seamlessly integrate live video
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Frictionless__: Stream automatically handles video codecs, protocols, and adaptive bitrate streaming for you.
- __Simple and serverless__: Whether you're building live streams for e-learning, sports or gaming apps, or company town halls, Stream scales — without you having to manage video infrastructure.
- __Cost-effective__: Pay only for minutes delivered and minutes stored — not for encoding, bandwidth, or packaging on-demand playback segments.

relatedBlades.title: Reduce glass-to-glass latency
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Minimal latency__: Low-Latency HLS HTTP Live Streaming (LL-HLS) offers glass-to-glass latency as low as three seconds.
- __Fast delivery worldwide__: Stream is powered by Cloudflare's global network, which can reach %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the Internet-connected population within just %{OperationMilliseconds}%.
- __Reduced buffering__: Adaptive bitrate encoding ensures smooth playback for all viewers, even on mobile devices or with slower connections.
- __Automatic recording__: Live videos are automatically encoded and packaged at no charge.

relatedBlades.title: Create the ideal video experience
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Interactive features__: Build live reactions, chats, and Q&As into video with the Cloudflare Developer Platform.
- __Editing__: Add captions in multiple languages, apply watermarks, clip videos, and more.
- __Control access__: Enable private, authenticated, or time-bound access; prevent downloads as needed.
- __Analytics__: Track details of viewer counts and viewing patterns to help plan your next live stream.

relatedBlades.title: Start streaming
relatedBlades.copy:
Stream handles __video streaming end-to-end__, from ingestion through delivery.

- For each live stream, create a unique live input via the dashboard or API.
- Each live input has a unique Stream key to provide to the streaming creator.
- Creators then broadcast live video to Stream over WebRTC, RTMPS, or SRT.
- Stream encodes this [live video](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/video/live-stream-encoding/) at multiple resolutions, and delivers it to viewers using Cloudflare's global network.

togglesTo.title: Video API
togglesTo.copy:
Upload, store, encode, and deliver live and on-demand video with one API:

- __Seamless integration__: A unified API helps your developers create a more reliable, cohesive application that enhances the end-user experience.
- __Scalability and flexibility__: Leverage the same API for both current and future video requirements. This makes it simpler to add features as you develop new content.

togglesTo.title: Adaptive Bitrate Streaming
togglesTo.copy:
Makes live streams available at multiple viewing quality levels via [Adaptive Bitrate Streaming (ABR)](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/video/what-is-adaptive-bitrate-streaming/). 

- Stream adapts based on the live video that Cloudflare receives, rather than the "advertised" bitrate.
- ABR ensures that live video plays at the highest quality for the viewer's available bandwidth.
- This is especially beneficial if you're building a creator platform or app where end users create their own live streams.

features.title: Frost & Sullivan 2022 Technology Innovation Leader in Global CDN
features.description: According to Frost & Sullivan, "In this intense landscape, Cloudflare is a leader investing in innovation to create products and services that constantly improve network capacity, website, and application performance."

features.title: 2022 IDC MarketScape for WW CDN Services
